product_name: CliniqueReady, Set, Refresh: Hydrating Skincare & Everyday Makeup Gift Set
summary: SummaryClinique Ready, Set, Refresh Gift Set is a set of 6 skincare and makeup staples for a fresh-faced look, including a silky makeup remover.
details: DetailsBenefitsClinique's All About Clean Rinse-Off Foaming Cleanser gently and effectively rinses away pollution, dirt, excess oil, long-wearing makeup, and sunscreen.Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator Gel Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid fights back against life's daily dehydrations. The lightweight gel-cream sinks into skin for deep, lasting hydration, for skin that feels more resilient and looks glowing.Clinique Pop Plush Creamy Lip Gloss coats lips with high shine and soothing hydration, all while delivering a pop of color.High Impact High-Fi Full Volume Mascara amps up lashes for 230% more volume, instantly.**Clinical testing on 31 women.Totally tugless Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover transforms from a solid balm into a silky oil to melt away eye and face makeups and sunscreens. Cleans thoroughly, rinses off completely. In a travel-ready size.All About Eyes Eye Cream with Vitamin C helps reduce the look of puffiness and undereye circles over time.Free of: parabens and phthalates.Dermatologist tested. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.IncludesFull Size All About Clean Rinse-Off Foaming Cleanser (5.0 oz)Full Size Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator Gel Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid (1.7 oz)Full Size Clinique Pop Plush Creamy Lip Gloss in Rosewater Pop (0.11 oz)Full Size High Impact High-Fi Full Volume Mascara in Intense Black/Brown (0.27 oz)Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover (0.5 oz)All About Eyes Eye Cream with Vitamin C (0.17 oz)Item 2641053How To UseAll About Clean Rinse-Off Foaming Cleanser: Lather cleanser between palms with lukewarm water. Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area. Rinse off.Use Moisture Surge 100H Hydrator Moisturizer morning and night on clean skin.Pop Plush Creamy Lip Gloss: Pull lip gloss applicator from vial and sweep across lips. Can be worn alone or layered with other lip products.High Impact High-Fi Mascara builds quickly. Starting at your lash roots, sweep the brush upward to see instant volume. Use the brush's precision tip to add definition and coat harder-to-reach corner lashes. Remove with your favorite Clinique eye makeup remover. You may see the fibers as they slip off during removal.Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover: Use this makeup remover balm before other cleansers and treatment products. Massage cleansing balm over dry skin with dry fingertips. Rinse well with warm water. Pat dry.Use All About Eyes Eye Cream with Vitamin C twice a day, morning and night. With ring finger, apply sparingly to entire eye area using a gentle patting motion.IngredientsSee packaging for full listing.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: All About Clean Rinse-Off Foaming Cleanser: Lather cleanser between palms with lukewarm water. Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area. Rinse off.Use Moisture Surge 100H Hydrator Moisturizer morning and night on clean skin.Pop Plush Creamy Lip Gloss: Pull lip gloss applicator from vial and sweep across lips. Can be worn alone or layered with other lip products.High Impact High-Fi Mascara builds quickly. Starting at your lash roots, sweep the brush upward to see instant volume. Use the brush's precision tip to add definition and coat harder-to-reach corner lashes. Remove with your favorite Clinique eye makeup remover. You may see the fibers as they slip off during removal.Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover: Use this makeup remover balm before other cleansers and treatment products. Massage cleansing balm over dry skin with dry fingertips. Rinse well with warm water. Pat dry.Use All About Eyes Eye Cream with Vitamin C twice a day, morning and night. With ring finger, apply sparingly to entire eye area using a gentle patting motion.
